overview.title: About Temperature Converter
overview.content: Our temperature converter allows you to quickly and accurately convert between different temperature measurement units. Supports all major units: Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin.

calculation.title: How Conversion Works
calculation.content: All temperature units are converted through the base unit - Celsius. Each unit has its own conversion formula, ensuring calculation accuracy.

units.title: Supported Units
units.content: The converter supports 3 main temperature units: Celsius (¬∞C), Fahrenheit (¬∞F), and Kelvin (K).

advantages.title: Advantages of Our Converter

faqItems.q: How to convert Celsius to Fahrenheit?
faqItems.a: Use the formula F = (C √ó 9/5) + 32. For example: 25¬∞C = (25 √ó 9/5) + 32 = 77¬∞F.

faqItems.q: How to convert Kelvin to Celsius?
faqItems.a: Use the formula C = K - 273.15. For example: 300K = 300 - 273.15 = 26.85¬∞C.

faqItems.q: How to convert Fahrenheit to Kelvin?

faqItems.a: Absolute zero is 0K (-273.15¬∞C or -459.67¬∞F). This is the lowest possible temperature.
